subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
Golf
lead_paragraph: The I.O.C.’s executive board also recommended that rugby and golf be included for the 2016 Games, but rejected baseball, karate, roller sports, softball and squash.
snippet: The I.O.C.’s executive board also recommended that rugby and golf be included for the 2016 Games, but rejected baseball, karate, roller sports, softball and squash.
